BE.MI.summary: Beghelli S.p.A. manufactures and sells various energy saving lighting products, electronic systems for domestic and industrial safety, and components for the photovoltaic power production in Italy and other European countries. It offers emergency luminaires, exit signs, LED modules with inverters, inverters, ceiling suspended systems, downlights, indoor and outdoor louvres, industrial and street lightings, projectors, floodlights, row systems, reglettes, and portable lights, as well as anti black-out and LED lamps; and building automation emergency, recessed and ceiling, and wall and ceiling products. The company also provides drinking water treatment, portable lights, batteries, and S.O.S. products. In addition, it offers helpline, after-sale, and case study services. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Monteveglio, Italy.

BEC.MI.summary: B&C Speakers S.p.A. manufactures and sells electro-acoustic transducer. It offers high frequency drivers and horns, coaxial components, and cone drivers, as well as LF and HF drivers, tweeters, and line arrays. The company provides its products under the B&C brand name, as well as supplies OEM components to professional audio brands in the market. It has operations in Italy and internationally. The company was formerly known as BBC Speakers SpA and changed its name to B&C Speakers S.p.A. in 1993. B&C Speakers S.p.A. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bagno a Ripoli, Italy. B&C Speakers S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Research & Development International S.r.L.

BEST.MI.summary: Be Shaping The Future S.p.A. provides business consulting, information technology, and professional services in Italy, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, Spain, Poland, Ukraine, and Romania. It operates through Business Consulting and ICT Solutions segments. The Business Consulting segment offers business consulting services in the areas of payment systems, planning and control methods, regulatory compliance, information gathering, and corporate governance systems for financial processes and asset management. This segment provides management consulting services for financial institutions; financial services consulting services in the banking and financial sectors; consulting and development services in the areas of accounting, bank reporting, and compliance; and advisory services for operators in the payments industry. The ICT Solutions segment offers ICT consulting and system integration services for proprietary products/platforms. This segment also develops digital, web, and mobile solutions; and web-based and multimedia software solutions. The company was formerly known as Be Think, Solve, Execute S.p.A. and changed its name to Be Shaping The Future S.p.A. in May 2020. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

BFE.MI.summary: Banca Finnat Euramerica S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides various financial services in Italy. It operates through Private Banking, Investment Banking, Advisory and Corporate Finance, Trusteeship Activity, Asset Management-Real Estate Fund Management, and Financial Holding and Governance Centre. The company offers a range of services, including private banking, family office, trusteeship, institutional investors, advisory and corporate finance, real estate and real estate funds, consulting, and other banking services. It has operative branches in Rome, Milan, and Novi Ligure. Banca Finnat Euramerica S.p.A. was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

BFG.MI.summary: B.F. S.p.A. engages in the cultivation and marketing of agricultural products in Italy. It offers pasta, rice, herbal teas, and legumes/cereals. The company markets its products under the Le Stagioni d'Italia brand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Jolanda di Savoia, Italy.

BGN.MI.summary: Banca Generali S.p.A. distributes financial products and services for affluent and private customers through financial advisors primarily in Italy. The company operates through Wealth Management CGU, Private Banking CGU, and Corporate Center segments. It offers asset management products, such as portfolio management, mutual funds, and SICAVs; banking products and services; insurance products, including life insurance and retirement investment products; and tools to manage securities portfolios and trade financial instruments, as well as short-term investment products comprising repurchase agreements. The company operates 211 bank branches and financial advisor offices. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Trieste, Italy. Banca Generali S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Assicurazioni Generali S.p.A.

BI2.F.summary: Biesse S.p.A. operates in the market for machinery and systems for processing wood, glass, stone, plastic, and metal in Western Europe, the Asia-Pacific, Eastern Europe, North America, and internationally. It operates through five segments: Wood, Glass & Stone, Mechatronics, Tooling, and Components. The Wood segment engages in the production, distribution, installation, and after-sales service of machines and systems for woodworking and composite materials processing. The Glass & Stone segment is involved in the production, distribution, installation, and after-sales service of glass and stone processing machines. The Mechatronics segment produces and distributes industrial mechanical and electronic components. The Tooling segment produces and distributes glass and stone processing tools for various machines on the market. The Components segment produces and distributes other components related to additional precision processing. The company offers its products under the Biesse and Intermac brands. It serves the automotive, aerospace, marine, technical articles, wind energy, defense, medical, construction, and signage sectors. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Pesaro, Italy. Biesse S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Bi.Fin. S.r.l.

BIA.MI.summary: Bialetti Industrie S.p.A. manufacturers and sells coffee pots and makers, and espresso machines in Italy. The company offers coffee capsules, and grounds and grains; monovalent and trivalent espresso machines; and moka, filtered, and special coffee makers, as well as coffee maker accessories. It also provides cookware, including plates and pans, accessories for special cooking, pots and casseroles, and molds; coffee cups and accessories; and small appliances. The company offers its products under the Bialetti, Aeternum, Rondine, and CEM brands. The company was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Coccaglio, Italy. Bialetti Industrie S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Bialetti Holding srl.

BIE.MI.summary: Bioera S.p.A. engages in the production and sale of organic products, natural cosmetics, and traditional food products in Italy. It operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, Wealth Management, and Banca Widiba SpA segments. The company offers funding and lending services, insurance products, financial advisory, and financial and non-financial services to private banking customers; electronic payment services; wealth management and financial planning services; consultancy on non-financial services, such as tax planning, real estate, art, and legal advisory; fiduciary and trust services; and digital banking services. It also provides leasing and factoring services for businesses, artisans, and professionals; and medium-and long-term credit facilities, corporate finance, capital markets, and structured finance services. In addition, the company offers investment banking products and services; and custody and deposit services for dairy products on behalf of third parties. Further, it develops and manages ICT and telecommunication systems. The company operates a network of 1,422 branches, 140 specialized centers, and 2,702 ATM machines in Italy; 1 operational branch in Shanghai; and 9 representative offices in the areas of Central-Eastern Europe, North Africa, India, and China. Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena S.p.A. was founded in 1472 and is headquartered in Siena, Italy.

The company develops, produces, and sells suspension components, including coil springs, stabilizer bars, torsion bars, stabilinkers, leaf springs, and track adjusters for cars, light and heavy commercial vehicles, earth-moving machines, armored vehicles, and railway rolling stock manufacturers; and precision springs for aerospace, nuclear energy, transport, energy production, oil and gas distribution, and medical applications. It also offers oil, petrol, diesel fuel, and air and passenger cabin filters for original equipment, replacement for original suppliers, and independent aftermarkets; and air and cooling systems, such as intake manifold systems, air induction systems, charged air ducting, thermostat housing and ducts, and coolant pump modules. In addition, the company operates nursing homes, functional and psychiatric rehabilitation units, and diagnostic centers; and provides treatment for serious cerebral injuries and neurological pathologies, as well as trauma or chronic-degenerative muscular and skeletal pathologies, as well as manages Ospedale Fratelli Montecchi di hospital in Suzzara, Italy. It offers healthcare services under the Anni Azzurri, Santo Stefano, Neomesia, and Charleston brands. CIR S.p.A. - Compagnie Industriali Riunite is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

BPE.MI.summary: BPER Banca S.p.A. provides banking products and services to individuals, and small and medium enterprises in Italy and internationally. The company operates through Retail, Private, Corporate, Large Corporate, Finance, Corporate Center, and Other Assets segments. It offers loans, mortgages, insurance and retirement planning, current and savings accounts, and other banking related services; credit, prepaid, and debit cards; and investments and savings products and services, such as certificates of deposit, investment services, mutual investment funds and sicavs that are financial instruments linked to asset management, portfolio management, alternative investments, accumulation plans, and financial insurance products. The company also provides corporate finance, mergers and acquisition advisory, risk management, liquidity and investment management, wealth management, and private and personal banking; subsidized loans, credit management, and loans and leasing services; receipts and payments; import and export financing; financing for working capital; letters of credit; guarantees; and Internet banking products and services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated through a network of 1,349 branches located in 19 regions in Italy, as well as a branch office in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. The company was formerly known as Banca popolare dell'Emilia Romagna s.c. BPER Banca S.p.A. was founded in 1867 and is headquartered in Modena, Italy.

The company operates through Retail, Private, Corporate, Large Corporate, Finance, Corporate Center, and Other Assets segments. It offers loans, mortgages, insurance and retirement planning, current and savings accounts, and other banking related services; credit, prepaid, and debit cards; and investments and savings products and services, such as certificates of deposit, investment services, mutual investment funds and sicavs that are financial instruments linked to asset management, portfolio management, alternative investments, accumulation plans, and financial insurance products. The company also provides corporate finance, mergers and acquisition advisory, risk management, liquidity and investment management, wealth management, and private and personal banking; subsidized loans, credit management, and loans and leasing services; receipts and payments; import and export financing; financing for working capital; letters of credit; guarantees; and Internet banking products and services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated through a network of 1,349 branches located in 19 regions in Italy, as well as a branch office in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. The company was formerly known as Banca popolare dell'Emilia Romagna s.c. BPER Banca S.p.A. was founded in 1867 and is headquartered in Modena, Italy.

BPM.F.summary: Banco BPM SocietÃ  per Azioni, through its subsidiaries, provides banking and financial products and services to individual, business, and corporate customers in Italy. The company operates through Retail, Corporate, Institutional, Private, Investment Banking, Strategic Partnerships, Leases, and Corporate Centre segments. It offers current accounts; home mortgages; personal loans; credit, debit, and prepaid cards; home, personal, and car and vehicle insurance; and investment products. The company also provides corporate financing, company leasing, corporate lending, project and real estate financing, payment and collections, trade and export finance, and digital services. In addition, it offers structuring of financial products, access to regulated markets, and the support and development of specialized financial services, as well as investment and transactional banking. As of December 31, 2019, it operated approximately 1,808 branches. The company was formerly known as Banco Popolare Societa Cooperativa Scarl and changed its name to Banco BPM SocietÃ  per Azioni in January 2017. Banco BPM SocietÃ  per Azioni is headquartered in Verona, Italy.

BPSO.MI.summary: Banca Popolare di Sondrio S.C.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Italy. The company offers current accounts, repurchase agreements, and loans primarily to retail customers and SMEs. It also offers credit and loans; deposits; leasing; asset management; lending and insurance; credit and debit cards; and collection and payment services. In addition, the company manages hotel facilities; issues government securities and prime corporate bonds; and manages and maintains rented units. It operates 346 branches. The company was founded in 1871 and is headquartered in Sondrio, Italy.

BPXXY.summary: BPER Banca S.p.A. provides banking products and services to individuals, and small and medium enterprises in Italy and internationally. The company operates through Retail, Private, Corporate, Large Corporate, Finance, Corporate Center, and Other Assets segments.
